gahetabbo.example_1: aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca ayamevattho ñāpito] kaṃ, bhikkhave, asanivicakkaṃ āgacchatu [upari tatiyavagge tariyacatutthasuttesu mā ca kho tvaṃ tāta sekhaṃ… anupāpuṇātūti āgataṃ. tena nayena idhāpi attho gahetabbo. ettha hi kiṃ saddena paṭikkhepatthopi sakkā ñātuṃ, yathā sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyyanti.
gahetabbo.comment: (of meaning) should be taken; should be grasped (by)
